Prosperty also operates leading marketplaces for real estate brokerage, mortgage intermediation, and auction promotion. Description: Augmenta is a software company that develops agricultural applications and provides technology solutions for farming environments.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Augmenta started its operations at the start of 2017, in Athens, Greece, by George Varvarelis and Dimitris Evangelopoulos, both farmers and embedded systems engineers and offers an Artificial Intelligence based solution comprised of a hardware device and a web platform, to any farmer, anywhere in the world that wants to have the best possible efficiency for every inch of his land and ultimately increase his seasonal net income. Augmenta’s “Field Analyzer”, is a plug and play device that can be attached to any tractor and can determine the amount of fertilizers, fungicides and pesticides that every inch of the farm needs to reach to its full potential, all in real-time. Furthermore, Field Analyzer is capable of controlling agricultural machinery (e.g. fertilizer spreaders) also in real-time, applying the optimal amount of chemicals into every inch of the farm completely automatically and without the farmer lifting a finger. Finally, the farmer can use Augmenta’s field-viewer, the company’s easy to use web platform, to observe the progression of his field through visual data analytics which help him keep track of the results of Augmenta’s real time operation but also assist him on making data-driven, customized decisions for the future, in a farm level scale and not in a generic geographical (county or even state/country) level scale which is the norm today. Augmenta has completed successfully 2 years of pilots, in 24 fields having staggering results and is currently conducting data-based pilots with food companies like Barilla and partnered with NVIDIA for the development of its cutting edge deep learning device.
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Hardware, Science and Engineering, Software
Top 5 Investors: Pymwymic, HCVC, CNH Industrial, Marathon Venture Capital, MassChallenge

Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Progressive Robotics is a cutting-edge technology company dedicated to transforming industrial automation through AI-powered, no-code software solutions. The company specializes in simplifying robotic deployment, making advanced automation accessible to businesses of all sizes. Their flagship platform empowers operators to program robotic arms in minutes, eliminating the need for costly system integrators and enabling efficiency gains of up to 20%. With a focus on tackling labor-intensive challenges like single and mixed-case palletizing, Progressive Robotics leverages state-of-the-art machine learning and 3D perception technologies to deliver smarter, faster, and safer solutions. By addressing key industry pain points—such as labor shortages and complex customization requirements—the company is redefining how businesses integrate robotics into supply chains, manufacturing, and logistics. Progressive Robotics is on a mission to bring Amazon-level robotics capabilities to small and medium-sized enterprises, empowering them to compete globally while enhancing collaboration between humans and machines.

Full Description: Ferryhopper is a newly launched online ferry booking platform that brings island-hopping around Greece to your fingertips. Our modern and innovative platform presents you with every available direct and indirect connection to over 160 Greek, Italian and Turkish ports. Through Ferryhopper, you can plan your ferry trip effortlessly, book your ticket quickly, compare prices instantly, secure the cheapest fare, and start hopping! Ferryhopper is the first –and only– booking platform that provides the user with indirect connections and routes to other destinations and makes ferry travelling in Greece easy and simple. Moreover, the island-hopping option allows the traveller to book multiple tickets in a single shot and plan their hopping around the islands without stress. Through novel ideas such as integration of e-ticket services and a simple and upgraded user experience, Ferryhopper provides a complete and novel ferry travelling solution.

In 2013, accusonus formed into an S.A. organization and accepted an angel round of investment from Michael Tzannes, who also joined the Board of Directors.  In 2016, accusonus, Inc was formed as a C-Corporation in Massachusetts adding Michael Tzannes as a founder.  accusonus, S.A. is a subsidiary of accusonus, Inc. Description: Access more than 500 self-guided and skip-the-line tours in 24 countries worldwide through your smartphone.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: We are a multifaceted VC-funded IT company with a strong focus on tourism and the cultural sector. We have cooperated with leading cultural institutions in Greece and abroad in order to create top-rated cultural tourism experiences. Our products are available on the world's leading marketplaces such as travel agencies such as Expedia, booking.com, Viator - TripAdvisor and KLOOK. Clio Muse Tours was founded in 2014 with the vision to generate universal cultural awareness and guide people in every part of the world, utilizing pioneering technology. Nowadays, we have created over 300 top-selling audio and skip-the-line tours as well as virtual tour experiences for both indoor and outdoor attractions in 11 countries including Greece, Italy, Spain, Turkey and the Netherlands. From history and mythology to gastronomy and architecture, our thematic audio tours cover a wide range of topics unraveling historical facts and unknown stories.  Clio Muse Tours has collaborated with numerous world-class cultural institutions creating and curating over 300 audio tours. Both our audio and virtual tours are available for Android and iOS devices and can be used in offline mode.  In 2019 we saw a 12 times growth in our revenue and the highest sales on our audio tours serving 50,000 travelers from all over the world. Due to the COVID-19 outbreak, we were forced to slow down our plans for expansion to new destinations. However, we managed to create an additional revenue stream that completes our business model and enhances our financial growth. We collaborate with even more museums to create digital tours.  Moreover, in 2020 we fully automated our Customer Care Department, which combined with the unlimited availability of our audio tours can really lead the distributors of our products to compensate for the reduced revenues of the previous year. - 10 international awards for our sustainable business model and content methodology  - Served 50K travelers in 2019
Industry Groups: Apps, Software, Travel and Tourism
Founders: Andreas Fatouros, Daphne Tsevreni, Yiannis Nikolopoulos

Description: Simpler, better, faster, cloud-based capacitive touch sensor simulation
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Fieldscale is the company behind SENSE. Sense offers state-of-the-art capacitive touch sensor cloud simulation software, for electric design and analysis, built from ground-up to support the constantly growing demands of engineers for accuracy and efficiency. Description: A Locations as a Service (Laas) technology provider willing to democratize precise location capabilities for IoT devices
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Loctio offers location estimation services in a Location as a Service (LaaS) model for IoT devices. The company’s solution has the ability to provide integral (chip/ module enabled) precise position estimation services to numerous applications while offering unprecedented power efficiency and phenomenal accuracy. The underlying technology uses solely Radio Frequency (RF) and digitalization circuitry for capturing the Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) signals and other signals of opportunity (cellular, BLE). The result prolongs the lifespan of IoT device batteries by migrating to the Cloud or Edge the vast majority of power-consuming calculations for reckoning location. Offering on top an advanced GNSS anti-spoofing shield, Loctio enhances its LaaS model with security capabilities that dovetail perfectly with any IoT deployment. This, in turn, makes location estimation flexible, generic, secure, cheaper and most importantly so power streamlined that it can be efficiently used in numerous IoT enabled devices as yet constrained or excluded.  Designed to be largely scalable and resilient, it addresses the global GNSS equipment & augmentation services market which is projected to reach approx. $175 Bn by 2029.Loctio foresees a universe of numerous interconnected devices each of them gifted with the charisma to accurately know or provide the means for determining its precise position. For a continuous consistent seamless location detection experience in both indoor and outdoor environments even amid harsh conditions a single technology is not enough thus multiple approaches shall be chained together. For reckoning timely and securely the position with acceptable precision, confidence and integrity apart from GNSS, localization methods and data from other terrestrial sources like but not limited to 5G and IMUs shall be baked in accompanied by advanced Machine Learning, Crowdsourcing-Fingerprinting or Collective Perception. Loctio is willing to render all this sophisticated IP processing throughout it's Cloud and Edge LaaS offering.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Software

Full Description: [i2.d] technologies is a deep tech start-up company that provides sophisticated B2B technology and services over the Cloud that facilitate the "behind the scenes" digital transformation and the SaaS architecture adoption. The company was founded to provide state-of-the-art technology and services for the SaaS delivery model. The company is targeting the SaaS market worldwide as a technology provider with a pioneering products and services portfolio. Based on its competitive innovation, agility, knowledge of service delivery providing, experience on large-scale developments and mastery of software technology, the company envisions to stand as worldwide leading technology enabler for the SaaS delivery model ...on [the soft side of] the Cloud.
Industry Groups: Information Technology

Industries: Analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Big Data, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing
Description: Pulse and Opinion is a big data extraction company that offers social media and sentiment analysis.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Pulse and Opinion is a deep learning platform. Pulse and Opinion provide 360 degree digital strategy services, communication consulting, and online reputation management for both brands and individuals. They offer big data strategy and data mining services.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software

Industries: E-Commerce, Enterprise Software, Software, Wine And Spirits, Winery
Description: ISTMOS designs, coordinates, and monitors several e-commerce platforms and has gained considerable experience in the area.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Istmos is a monitoring tool for wine producers to ensure the best quality in wine production. It will deliver a monitoring system for the most critical parameters (temperature, humidity and luminosity) that may affect quality of bottled wine during storage. ISTMOS has the ability for real time data recording of environmental parameters and will create alerts when conditions are violating predefined values, by monitoring the conditions in the storage.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Food and Beverage, Software

Description: Mobile Imaging Technologies
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: QCELL innovates in spectral imaging. Particularly the company has invented and developed the first ever 5MP-video spectral camera, operating on mobile phones and tablets: the inSPECT camera. In company’s  products, the real time snapshot spectral imaging is combined with embedded Artificial Intelligence algorithms to enable the display of spectral, thematic and diagnostic maps at video rates! QCELL further advances the unique capabilities of hyperspectral imaging, while, at the same time, converting this high-end, tabletop technology to a handheld device, thus opening new markets. Based on the intelligent spectroscopy (inSPECT) camera platform, the company offers a product family with unique features that are indented to address unmet market needs.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Consumer Electronics, Data and Analytics, Hardware, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: Data-driven Energy Efficiency
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: DTWISE offers data-driven, energy efficiency and building CO2 neutralization solutions for commercial buildings, warehouses, factories, supermarkets, hotels, etc
Industry Groups: Energy, Sustainability

Industries: Advertising, Content Discovery, Music, Software, Video
Description: ReEmbed is a custom video player that supports embeds from YouTube, Vimeo, and Dailymotion as well as HTML5 videos.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: ReEmbed is a custom video player that supports embeds from YouTube, Vimeo, and Dailymotion as well as HTML5 videos. It allows its users to create their own video player using the ReEmbed wizard. Its users have the ability to choose a style, add their logo, and pick their colors. Then it enables its users to match their site’s look and feel, and spread their brand when their videos are shared. ReEmbed suite allows its users to monitor performance by tracking impressions, plays, and completions. It is also capable of increasing its users’ site’s page views and user engagement with ReEmbed’s content recommendation widgets. ReEmbed was launched in 2014 and is based in Athens.
Industry Groups: Advertising, Content and Publishing, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Sales and Marketing, Software, Video

Description: CYRUS offers a noise-free hydrogen compression system based on metal hydrides.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: CYRUS offers a noise free hydrogen compression system based on metal hydrides using only water as the cooling / heating medium achieving hydrogen pressures > 500 bar

Industries: Location Based Services, Price Comparison, Ticketing, Travel
Description: CaptainWise is an experienced captain whose purpose is to take you to places using as a compass your budget and your desires.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: CaptainWise is an experienced captain whose purpose is to take you to places using as a compass your budget and your desires. The countless internet results are narrowed down, and only the ones suitable for each user's needs will be presented to them as packages, giving you the power to modify the details easily. We believe in creating an ideal travel experience which is fun, where the search is not endless or confusing but efficient and helpful. After all, the joy of a trip is not only the travel itself but also the thrill of searching for your next adventure. We just make it easy!
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Events, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Navigation and Mapping, Travel and Tourism
Founders: Andreas Karoutzos, Chris Chatziapostolakis, Dimitris Schizas

Description: Wubby is an ecosystem of software components and services for rapid development of everyday objects.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Wubby is an ecosystem of software components and services for rapid development of everyday objects. Everyday objects are physical objects embedded with electronics, software, sensors and network connectivity to collect and exchange data. A network of everyday objects is also known as Internet of Things (IoT).
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Software
